chart_description: This chart gives an average read/write latency of logical disks in seconds. It helps to monitor disk performance by indicating the time taken by the system to read/write data on a logical disk. Higher latency time indicates slow disk performance, which can impact overall system performance.

dimension_descriptions.read: This dimension shows the average read latency of logical disks in seconds. It indicates the time taken by the system to read data from a logical disk.
dimension_descriptions.write: This dimension shows the average write latency of logical disks in seconds. It indicates the time taken by the system to write data on a logical disk.
